summary: In this article the authors leverage whole-genome sequencing and comparative genomics to analyze the novel Agua Salud alphavirus (ASALV), finding that the virus represents the first insect-restricted alphavirus of the New World.

use_cases.case: The data under accession number NC_034156 was used for comparison of short repeated sequence (SRS) motifs and repeated sequence elements (RSEs) found within the newly sequenced ASALV genome sequence.
